description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

NotNTR
NotNTRR

He may look shady, but no, it's not NTR!!!
___

altTitles.en: Overgeared (Team Argo)

altTitles.ja: テムパル〜アイテムの力〜

description.de:
Shin Youngwoo spielt mit seinem Avatar "Grid" das zurzeit beliebteste Virtual-Reality-Spiel der Welt: Satisfy.  
  
Ob in der Realität oder in-game, Shin scheint vom Unglück verfolgt zu werden. Doch als er nach der Suche nach einem Questgegenstand seine Belohnung erhält, kann er zu einer legendären Klasse wechseln. Einer Klasse, die außer ihm niemand der über 2 Milliarden Spielern besitzt.
description.en:
Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….
description.fa:
⁧⁧بزرگ‌ترین بازی واقعیت مجازی جهان «ستیسفای».  
⁧چه تو واقعیت و چه در دنیای مجازی شینگ وو کسی بود که همه‌ی بدبختی‌ها سرش می‌اومد.  
⁧اما تو میون این‌همه بدبختی‌، یه‌بار شانس بهش رو می‌کنه و تو یه مأموریت غیرممکن کتاب پاگما رو پیدا می‌کنه، کتابی افسانه‌ای که زندگی اون رو از این رو به اون رو می‌کنه.
description.fr:
Quand un joueur raté de VMMORPG tombe, lors d’une quête, sur un livre légendaire permettant de changer de classe, il en profite immédiatement. Attention joueurs, le plus grand de tous les forgerons est né ! Et il n‘a pas prévu de passer inaperçu !

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/overgeared)
description.id:
Shin Youngwoo punya kehidupan yang bernasib sial. Ia terpaksa bekerja kasar di sebuah tempat kontruksi untuk membayar biaya sekolah dan uang game yang ia gunakan. Bahkan ia juga kerja kasar di VR Game yang bernama Satisfy. Namun, hidupnya mulai berubah ketika karakternya sebagai 'Grid' di game menemukan 'Pagma's Rare Book' hingga menjadi legendary class player.

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kekuatan-Item/3406)
description.ja:
世界最高のバーチャルリアリティゲーム<SATISFY>。 全世界ユーザー数２０億人、もう一つの地球と呼ばれるほどの壮大なファンタジーゲーム。 しがない無職のゲーム中毒者である「長嶺巧」はゲーム課金の借金を返すために日雇い労働をする以外のほとんどの時間はゲームに費やしていた。 ある日、クエスト中にレジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞を手に入れた「巧」。 ＜ファグマの奇書＞売って大儲けできると思ったその瞬間…！新たなクエストが発動され殺される寸前になるが… このままだと殺され、レジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞もなくしてしまうと思った「巧」は＜ファグマの奇書＞を開き、伝説の職人＜ファグマの末裔＞へとジョブチェンジするが… 借金まみれの底辺人生から２０億プレイヤーの頂点に立つレジェンダリープレイヤーになれるのか！？

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/43170)
description.ko:
[신영우 (유저 네임: 그리드)]
세계 최고의 가상 현실 게임 <SATISFY>.

현실에서나, 게임 속에서나, 불운은 항상 그의 곁을 맴도는데....
퀘스트 수행 중 우연히 발견한 게임 속 로또, '파그마의 기서'. 
20억 명이 넘는 유저 중 유일한 최강의 레전드리 직업으로 전직.

"어떻게 아직 살아있는 거지...?!"

"뭐, 특별한 건 없고..."


"템빨이죠."

지긋지긋한 불운과 악몽 같은 빚쟁이 인생에서 벗어난
최강 플레이어 "그리드".
고인물도 울고 갈 끝판왕이 찾아온다!

[<SATISFY>에 접속합니다.]

웹툰 <템빨>은 매주 토요일 연재됩니다.
description.ru: В реальности, в играх, где бы он ни был, ему сопутствуют неудачи... Но в один момент всё меняется. В игре конце Северной пещеры он обнаружит квест, в котором найдёт "Редкую книгу Пагмы"... Ему удастся то, что не удалось сотням миллионов пользователей. - Как ты выжил? - Ничего особенного.
description.th:
ชินยองอู ID กริด ไม่ว่าจะในชีวิตจริงหรือในในโลกเกมเสมือนจริง SATISFY เขาก็เป็นตัวแทนแห่งความอับโชคไม่ต่างกัน...
แต่อยู่มาวันหนึ่ง กริด ได้พบกับตำราเปลี่ยนอาชีพที่นำเขาไปสู่การเปลี่ยนเป็นอาชีพระดับตำนาน 'ทายาทของแพ็กม่า'
อาชีพช่างตีเหล็กในตำนานที่จะทำให้เขาหลุดพ้นจากหนี้สิน พร้อมกับได้สัมผัส 'พลังแห่งไอเทม' และก้าวสู่การเป็นผู้เล่นที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุด!

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Overgeared/43)
description.zh:
无论是现实世界还是游戏世界中，他都是最底层的存在！然而咸鱼翻身的机会终于来了！只要能够找到游戏中的最强装备，就能获得超20亿玩家中唯一一个成为传说中最强职业电竞选手的机会！他能否在假想现实游戏世界中创造新的传奇，成功脱离如同噩梦般的悲惨人生呢？

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28630)
description.zh-hk:
[申英宇(使用者名稱：格里德)]
稱霸全球的虛擬實境遊戲《SATISFY》

無論現實還是遊戲中，他都是個「不幸」的象徵...
在解任務時偶然發現
遊戲中的樂透——「帕格瑪的奇書」，
並轉職成20億玩家中，僅只一名的最強傳奇級職業。

「你怎麼還活著...?!」

「嗯...也沒什麼啦...」

「靠裝備囉。」

脫離不幸與惡夢般的債務，
重生為最強玩家的「格里德」!
經典名著通通滾開，真正的王者駕到了!

[已成功登入《SATISFY》。]

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%A3%9D%E5%82%99%E4%BB%94/47)

title.en: The Perfect Idol's Guide to Falling in Love

altTitles.vi: Cẩm Nang Thu Phục Idol Hoàn Mỹ

altTitles.en: Falling in Love For Real
The Perfect Idol's Handbook of Falling in Love

altTitles.zh-ro: Wán měi Ài Dòu Lún xiàn Shǒu cè

description.en: The girl group, MYSTERY, which has remained unpopularity even after three years together, suddenly announces their seperationt on their third anniversary. The first team, known for its hot and sexy style, is led by the original captain, Windy. However, the new captain, Wangshu, with her sweet and lively image, has been appointed unexpectedly. Wangshu appears to be obedient and sensible, always clinging to Windy, but it seems she harbors special feelings for this "jiejie"...

altTitles.th: Re:Monster ราชันชาติอสูร

description.en: Tomokui Kanata has been reincarnated into the weakest race, goblin, and given a new name, Gobrou, after having undergone an unfortunate death. However, Gobrou has retained his previous life's memories and ability to learn skills from what he eats. In this alternate world of survival of the fittest, events unfold. Will a goblin party become the heroes of this world, in a delightful twist from your usual scenario?
description.pt-br: Tomokui Kanata reincarnou na raça mais fraca, a dos goblins e ganhou um novo nome, Rou, após ter morrido de forma infeliz. Entretanto, o goblin Rou preservou as lembranças de sua vida passada, ganhando uma evolução incomum, mas mantendo sua capacidade de ganhar habilidades por comê-los. Neste mundo alternativo de sobrevivência do mais forte, com o desenrolar dos acontecimentos, irá o grupo do goblins se tornarem os heróis deste mundo e o transformarem em um cenário totalmente diferente do habitual? Ele irá se tornar o herói deste mundo ou um soberano das trevas dominará a todos?

title.en: Shijou Saikyou no Mahou Kenshi, F Rank Boukensha ni Tensei Suru ~Kensei to Matei, 2 Tsu no Zense o motta Otoko no Eiyuutan~

altTitles.en: The Strongest Magical Swordsman Ever Reborn as an F-Rank Adventurer

altTitles.ja: 史上最強の魔法剣士、Fランク冒険者に転生する　～剣聖と魔帝、2つの前世を持った男の英雄譚～

altTitles.zh: 最强之人转生成F级冒险者

altTitles.ko: 사상 최강의 마법검사, F랭크 모험자로 전생한다~검성과 마제, 2개의 전생을 가진 남자들의 영웅담~

description.en: Yuri was the hero who saved the world, being called "Demon Emperor" in his first reincarnation and "Sword Saint" in his second reincarnation. However, before he knew it, he was considered a "monster" and was shunned by people. Yuri finally gets fed up and decides to live 100% for himself next time. He reincarnates into the future and is immediately attacked by monsters. As he defends himself, Yuri acquires the skills of his previous lives and quickly annihilates his enemies. Eventually, Yuri arrives at the adventurers guild and decides to start his life as an F-rank novice adventurer while hiding his true strength.
description.id: Aizawa Yuri telah bereinkarnasi sebanyak 2x dan ia telah lelah menjadi penguasa ini dan itu. Dengan skill miliknya memungkinkan ia mendapatkan artefak reinkarnasi, dan ia memulai kesehariannya di dunia barunya!
description.ja: 一度目の転生では《魔帝》、二度目の転生では《剣聖》と呼ばれ、世界を救った勇者ユーリ。しかし、いつしか《化物》と人々に疎まれる存在になっていた。ついに嫌気が差したユーリは、次こそ100%自分のために生きると決意。未来の世界に再び転生する。その転生直後から襲い来るモンスターたち。咄嗟に対応するうちに、ユーリは次々と前世・前前世のスキルを取得し、あっという間に敵を殲滅していく。やがてギルドにたどり着いたユーリは、《魔帝》と《剣聖》の最強の力を秘めながら、Fランクの駆け出し冒険者として生活を始めることにするのだった――。

title.en: "Zako ni wa Kaji ga Oniai da www" to Iwareta Kaji Level 9999 no Ore, Tsuihousareta no de Boukensha ni Tenshokusuru ~Saikyou Buki de Musou Shinagara Guild de Tanoshiku Kurashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 「雑魚には鍛冶がお似合いだwww」と言われた鍛冶レベル9999の俺、追放されたので冒険者に転職する ～最強武器で無双しながらギルドで楽しく暮らします～

altTitles.en: I, a Level 9999 Blacksmith Who Was Told That "Blacksmithing Is Suitable for a Small Fry lololol" Was Expelled From the Guild, so I Changed My Job to an Adventurer: I Will Live Happily in the Guild While being Unrivaled with the Strongest Weapons!

description.en: Makina, a blacksmith who worked in the renowned guild “Silver Wings,” is expelled from his guild. The reason? Guild members who don’t value their weapons believed it was more cost-effective to buy them rather than employ his services. Lost and uncertain about his future, Makina receives an invitation from his childhood friend and adventurer, Aria. He joins Aria’s guild, “Rainbow Butterflies.” It’s here that Makina’s blacksmithing talents truly shine. With his weapons in the hands of guild members, they collectively rise to become the mightiest of all.
description.ja:
「武器を弄るだけの奴をは認めねぇ」

武器使いの荒いメンバーたちのため、常に武器を鍛え続けていたにもかかわらず、突然理不尽な理由でギルド『白銀の翼』を追放されてしまった鍛冶師マキナ。途方に暮れ街を彷徨うマキナだったが、偶然ごろつきたちに襲われる幼馴染のアリアを発見する。すぐに愛剣イフリートで彼女を助け出すと、事情を知った彼女から、所属する新興ギルド『虹の蝶』への冒険者としての加入を勧められる。そこで類稀なる鍛冶スキルを発揮したマキナは、彼の作るチート級武器を手にした仲間たちと共に、最強のギルドを目指して無双する!!

altTitles.en: VERSUS

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
___
**Compositor:** [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71)
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

title.en: Isekai Ten'i Shita node Cheat o Ikashite Mahou Kenshi Yaru Koto ni Suru

altTitles.ja: 異世界転移したのでチートを生かして魔法剣士やることにする

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Ten'i Shita node Cheat wo Ikashite Mahou Kenshi Yaru Koto ni Suru

altTitles.en: I Think I'll Cheat to Become a Spellsword in Another World
After Being Transferred to Another World I Became a Magical Swordsman Through Cheats
Since I got transferred to another world, I will make good use of cheats and become a magic swordsman
Isekai Cheat Magic Swordsman

altTitles.zh: 转移到异世界活用外挂成为魔法剑士

altTitles.th: ถูกส่งมาต่างโลกทั้งที ขอพี่เป็นนักดาบเวทสุดโกงซะเลย

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉移到異世界活用外掛成為魔法劍士

altTitles.ko: 이세계로 전이해서 치트를 살려 마법 검사가 된다

altTitles.pt-br: Já que fui transferido para outro mundo, vou fazer bom uso de cheats e me tornar um espadachim mágico

description.en:
A Level 1 adventurer, leveling up at an explosive rate with nonstandard skills and magic power? Kaede Suzumiya, a gamer, fell asleep while playing all night and when he woke up he found himself in another world, a fantasy world where using magic is possible! Using his knowledge of games, skills, and cheats acquired in this new world he decides to enjoy as much of his new life through magic and sword!
___
Composition: [Watanabe Itsuki](https://mangadex.org/author/eb66b421-fb65-4aca-95d0-e6d29fc3ba78/watanabe-itsuki)
Character Design: [Tomozo](https://mangadex.org/author/06807b9d-e259-4aac-967e-ea5847bff9b8/tomozo)
description.pt-br: Um aventureiro de nível 1, subindo de nível em uma taxa explosiva com habilidades fora do padrão e poder mágico? Kaede Suzumiya, um gamer, adormeceu enquanto jogava a noite toda e, ao acordar encontrou-se em um outro mundo, um mundo de fantasia onde usar mágica é possível! Usando seu conhecimento de jogos, skills e cheats adquiridos nesse novo mundo ele decide desfrutar o máximo de sua nova vida por meio de magia espada! Este é um conto de aventura da Shinkou Shotou (Progressive Islands), a mesma empresa que trouxe para você "Shikkaku Mon no Saikyou Kenja", "Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life" e "Isekai Kenja no Tensei Musou"!

description.en: After—something—changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town—reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.

title.en: Tsuihou Yuusha no Yuugana Slow Life: Jiyuu ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!

altTitles.en: The Elegant Life of the Exiled Hero: When I Became Free, I Also Gained My Beloved Angel!

altTitles.ja: 追放勇者の優雅な生活 ～自由になったら俺だけの最愛天使も手に入った！～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihō Yūsha no Yūgana Seikatsu (Slow Life) ～Jiyū ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!～

description.en:
After suddenly being fired despite serving as a hero for 30 years, Alec was left with nowhere to turn. Orphaned from a young age, he had no parents to rely on, and having been a hero since childhood, he lacked basic common sense. With nowhere else to go, Alec ends up at an unexpected place—a slave market!?

There, he encounters the beautiful and kind-hearted Lyrishia.

This is the story of an unwittingly strongest protagonist and an angelic heroine weaving an excessively naughty second life together.

Coquettish Lawyer x Tsundere Detective! Officer Shen, the human-lie-detector detective, finds it difficult to resist the smooth-talking lawyer, his nemesis who spits out lies like flowing electric current. "You used to be my closest friend, yet you ruined my reputation. Now you actually dare to come back and lick me?!” The elite police officer, after demoted to the Useless Department, meets his Mr. Liar again. Can the past misunderstandings between them be resolved? Can they go back to how they were in the past?

altTitles.ja: 恋文と13歳の女優（アクトレス）

altTitles.en: A Love Letter and a 13-Year-Old Actress

description.en:
Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day, he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him...?

She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than most adults.
A dramatic story woven between a professional child actress and her manager!

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)
description.ja: 芸能事務所で経理として働く一色文は、ある日営業へと部署異動を言い渡される。担当するまだ13歳の子役の少女、羽賀文乃は、妙に文のことを気に入ったようで…？

description.en:
Monk Sanzang from the "Journey to the west" has time slipped to the present-day Korea.   
  
She has lived her lifetime constantly fighting yokai but her most dangerous opponent turns out to be just one guy?!  
  
On the orders of Buddha, Monk Sanzang and her companions pilgramaged the Western regions in search of his teachings.  
Unlike Sun Wukong, Zhu Bajie, and Sha Wujing, who hoped to become gods in recognition of their contribution, rather than being tied down to the life of Buddhism, Sanzang wanted to remain in the human world and enjoy a new life as an ordinary human.  
  
But as she was being dragged to Heaven by orders from the Buddha, she notices a strange tunnel leading to the human world in which she escapes into…  
  
And the place where she fell is the Republic of Korea's Jeju Island!  
And she meets a guy named Lee Hyun?!  
  
The time-slipped Monk Sanzang a.k.a Hyeonjeong and the tsundere Lee Hyun's turbulent romance!

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.en:
Love Lab is set in Fujisaki Girls Academy, which is known for their school body being composed of very prim and proper middle school students. The most prominent one of them is Natsuo Maki, the student council president who is admired by her classmates for her calm and polite demeanor, and her profound beauty. On the other hand, Riko Kurahashi is also admired, but due to her having a very forward and boyish personality.   
  
One day, Riko accidentally walks into Maki when she is kissing a body pillow with a picture of a guy for practice, and learns that she is not as collected as everyone thinks she is. Riko is forced into keeping Maki's secret and joins her in practicing romance activities such as holding hands and more, and in the middle of all that mess, somehow smoothly running a student council regardless!

altTitles.vi: Các Hiệp sĩ trong khu Vực

altTitles.th: อัศวินในพื้นที่

description.en:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).
description.pt-br: Suguru e Kakeru são dois irmãos que jogam futebol como ninguém. Suguru, aos 15 anos, já se tornou estrela da seleção japonesa; já Kakeru? bem, ele é tão talentoso quanto o irmão, mas decidiu abandonar os gramados e atuar só como auxiliar técnico depois de um acidente na oitava série. Claro, Suguru sabe do talento que o irmão tem e não se conforma com a decisão dele. O que poderá acontecer para que Kakeru mude de ideia e volte a ajudar o time de dentro de campo, onde seu irmão o espera??

altTitles.en: Because the Sky is Gray

description.en:
A collection of short stories about the everyday lives of girls who have trouble with the people around them.

---

The first volume contains stories about...
- A lonely woman who works part-time, and who has crippling social anxiety that leads to misunderstandings.
- A girl who is 'dumped' by her close friend.
- A single mother who struggles to understand how to make her daughter happy.
- A girl who desperately wants to buy a dress that she thinks could change her life.
... and many more!

(Source: MangaHelpers)

In a town with no baseball team, young Bungo spends his days throwing the ball he received as a gift against a wall until Yukio Noda, Japanese representative youth baseball player, appears before him and an unexpected showdown ensues! After a chance meeting in middle school, these two enroll in Seio Senior where they struggle to make it to Koshien with everything they have.
description.pt-br: Em uma cidade sem time de beisebol, o jovem Bungo passa seus dias jogando a bola que recebeu como presente contra uma parede até que Yukio Noda, o jogador de beisebol jovem representante japonês, aparece diante dele e um confronto inesperado acontece! Depois de um encontro casual no ensino médio, esses dois se matriculam no Seio Senior, onde lutam para chegar a Koshien com tudo o que têm.

title.en: Ane ga Kensei de Imouto ga Kenja de

altTitles.ja: 姉が剣聖で妹が賢者で

altTitles.en: My Older Sister is a Sword Saint and My Younger Sister is a Sage

altTitles.zh: 姐姐是剑圣妹妹是贤者

description.en: The Ralk Kingdom is a country of extreme meritocracy, but Razel, the son of the stupid king, has no talent for martial arts, and because he is always compared to his older sister who is a sword saint and his younger sister who is a sage, he gets banished from the kingdom. From then on, he tries to live as an adventurer in a different country, but his older and younger sisters, who love him dearly, come after him!?
description.ja: 実力主義国家ラルク。その国王の息子でありながら弱いラゼルは追放されてしまう。追放されても持ち前のポジティブさで、他国で冒険者になろうとするが、そこに最強のお姉ちゃんが追ってくる！
description.pt:
A superpoderosa nação de Ralk onde o poder determina tudo. Razel, que é o filho do rei, é exilado do país porque não tem talento para espada e magia em comparação com suas irmãs. Com pensamentos positivos, ele procura um país diferente para aprender a ser aventureiro e viver livremente, mas suas irmãs que o amam também o acompanham.   
  
Uma fantástica aventura com suas irmãs começa!

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock!

description.en:
Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

title.en: "Mou.... Hatarakitakunaindesu" Boukensha Nanka Yamete yaru. Imasara, Taiguu wo Kaerukara to Onegai sarete mo Okotowaridesu. Boku wa Zettai Hatarakimasen.

altTitles.ja: 『もう‥‥働きたくないんです』冒険者なんか辞めてやる。今更、待遇を変えるからとお願いされてもお断りです。僕はぜーったい働きません。

altTitles.en: I... Don't Want to Work Anymore. I Quit Being an Adventurer For Good and You Can't Stop Me.

altTitles.es-la: "Yo... no quiero trabajar más" Dejé de ser un aventurero. Aunque me traten mejor ahora, no lo haré. No volveré a trabajar.

altTitles.th: 「เบื่อ… ไม่อยากทำงานแล้วครับ」นักผจญภัยอะไรนั่นไม่เอาด้วยแล้ว จะเปลี่ยนเงื่อนไขการทำงานให้ก็ขอปฏิเสธ ผมน่ะจะไม่ทำงานอีกต่อไปแล้ววว

altTitles.ko: ″이제… 일하고 싶지 않습니다″ 이제 와서 잘해줄 테니 돌아오라고 해도 거절합니다.

altTitles.ru: Я авантюрист который не хочет работать

altTitles.id: "Aku... Tidak Akan Bekerja" Aku Berhenti Jadi Petualang. Bahkan Jika Diperlakukan Lebih Baik, Tetap Tidak Akan. Aku Tidak Akan Bekerja lagi

description.en: Ex, an E-rank adventurer, makes a decision one day after five years of slaving away at the guild. "I'm quitting this job!" Ex was belittled for only being able to use beginner magic, but as it turns out, it had a special trait... Even if people threaten him or ask him to do anything, it's too late for them. "I'm neeeever gonna work anymore!"
description.ja: 元Ｅ級冒険者のエクス１９歳。才能の全てを“効果時間延長”に特化した異才の魔導師は、５年間、年中無休で奴隷のように働く毎日を過ごしてきた。ついに過労で倒れてしまい、玄関先で目を覚ましたある日、ようやく自分の心と向き合う。「こんな仕事、辞めてやるっ！」冒険者を辞めたエクスは、もう働かないことを宣言。これまでエクスの効果時間が異常に長い初級魔法の恩恵を享受してきた連中は、彼の代わりなど誰もいないことに気づいて慌てふためくが、もう遅い。脅してきても、すがりついてきても、ニッコリ笑って全部お断り。「僕はもう、ぜーったい働きません！」働かない宣言わした初級魔導師の新しい生活が、今はじまる！
description.es-la:
Aix es un aventurero de rango E de 19 años. Es un mago "prodigio" que se especializa únicamente en la "Extensión de la duración de los efectos". Ha pasado los últimos cinco años trabajando como un esclavo durante todas la semanas. Cuando por fin se derrumba por el cansancio y se despierta en la puerta de su casa, por fin se reconcilia consigo mismo. "¡Voy a dejar este trabajo!" Tras dejar su trabajo como aventurero, Aix anuncia que no trabajará más. La gente que había estado disfrutando de los beneficios de la magia de novato de duración inusual de Aix, entró en pánico cuando se dio cuenta de que no había nadie para reemplazarlo, pero era demasiado tarde. Sonrió y rechazó todas las amenazas e intentos de forzarlo a trabajar. "¡Nunca volveré a trabajar!" 

¡La nueva vida de un mago novato que se dijo así mismo que no trabajará comienza ahora!

altTitles.en: Feast of the Valkyries: ~Cooking with Shirabe~

altTitles.ja: 戦姫完食シンフォギア～調めし～

description.en: An official spinoff of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series! The divas' next battlefield is a warm gourmet comedy with the chief kitchen maid, Shirabe! Another Symphogear ballad, fresh from the kitchen.

altTitles.ja: 魔のものたちは企てる

altTitles.en: The Demon Bunch Plans

description.en:
Is this how we deal with top-level adventurers?!
The daily struggles of the Demon Lord's army in an "R&D Discussion" comedy!

title.en: Snow White with the Red Hair

altTitles.th: สโนไวท์ผมแดง

description.en:
Shirayuki, a young girl born with unique apple-red hair, happens to meet a famous but foolish young man, Prince Raji. He falls in love with Shirayuki at first sight, and orders her to become his concubine.  
  
Determined to do whatever it takes to resist his advances, but with nowhere else to go, Shirayuki cuts her hair and escapes to a neighboring country. While traversing through the forests, she meets an injured boy, Zen. After she boldly heals his wounds, he in return helps her. Meanwhile, Prince Raji sends out his henchmen to search for her.  
  
What will become of Shirayuki? What is Zen’s true character? A refreshing fantasy story between an optimistic heroine and a prince who constantly stays on her watch.  
  
**Extra stories:**  
v01 - Hachigatsu no Shikisa (Four-season Colour of August)  
v02 - Bokura o Tsunaide. (Bind Us)  
v14 - Natsu Yasumi Zero Zero Nichime (00 Day of Summer Holiday)
description.es: Shirayuki, una joven nacida con un singular cabello rojo manzana, conoce por casualidad a un joven famoso pero insensato, el príncipe Raji. Éste se enamora de Shirayuki a primera vista y le ordena que se convierta en su concubina. Decidida a hacer lo que sea para resistirse a sus avances, pero sin ningún otro sitio al que ir, Shirayuki se corta el pelo y escapa a un país vecino. Mientras atraviesa los bosques, conoce a un niño herido, Zen. Después de que ella le cure sus heridas, él la ayuda a ella. Mientras tanto, el príncipe Raji envía a sus secuaces a buscarla. ¿Qué será de Shirayuki? ¿Cuál es el verdadero carácter de Zen? Una refrescante historia de fantasía entre una heroína optimista y un príncipe que la vigila constantemente.
description.pt-br:
Shirayuki, uma jovem que nasceu com um cabelo ruivo-maçã único, conhece um jovem famoso, mas tolo, o príncipe Raji. Ele se apaixona por Shirayuki à primeira vista e ordena que ela se torne sua concubina.  
  
Determinada a fazer o que for preciso para resistir aos seus avanços, mas sem ter para onde ir, Shirayuki corta o cabelo e foge para um país vizinho. Enquanto atravessava as florestas, ela conhece um menino ferido, Zen. Depois que ela corajosamente cura suas feridas, ele em troca a ajuda. Enquanto isso, o Príncipe Raji envia seus capangas para procurá-la.  
  
O que será de Shirayuki? Qual é o verdadeiro caráter do Zen? Uma refrescante história de fantasia entre uma heroína otimista e um príncipe que permanece constantemente sob sua vigilância.  
  
**Histórias extras:**  
v01 - Hachigatsu no Shikisa (cor das quatro estações de agosto)  
v02 - Bokura ou Tsunaide. (Ligue-nos)  
v14 - Natsu Yasumi Zero Zero Nichime (00 dia de férias de verão)

altTitles.en: Monster #8

description.en:
A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)
description.es:
Japón tiene la mayor tasa de incidencias por ataques de Kaijus de todo el mundo. Los Kaijus irrumpen continuamente y sin piedad en las vidas cotidianas de la gente. Kafka Hibino, que siempre quiso ser un miembro de las Fuerzas de Defensa, actualmente trabaja como limpiador de cadáveres de Kaijus.
Sin embargo, un día, una misteriosa criatura convierte a Kafka en un Kaiju, y las Fuerzas de Defensa de Japón, encargados de derrotar a estos monstruos, le identificaron con el nombre clave de “Kaiju N.8”.
description.fr:
Enfant, Kafka Hibino rêvait d’intégrer les Forces de Défense pour combattre ces terribles ennemis, mais après de nombreux échecs à l’examen d’entrée, ce trentenaire travaille à nettoyer les rues de leurs encombrants cadavres. Jusqu’au jour où une mystérieuse créature s’introduit dans son organisme et le métamorphose en une entité surpuissante mi-humaine, mi-kaiju. Son nouveau nom de code : “Kaiju n° 8” !

Maison d'édition FR : Kazé / Crunchyroll
description.it:
Un uomo, infelice del lavoro che deve fare per il resto della sua vita, rimane coinvolto in un evento inaspettato…!  
Si è trasformato in un kaiju, una creatura mostruosa, che gli darà un'altra opportunità per raggiungere ciò che ha sempre sognato!
description.ja: 怪獣発生率が世界屈指の日本。この国は、容赦なく怪獣が日常を侵していた。かつて防衛隊員を目指していたが、今は怪獣専門清掃業で働く日比野カフカ。ある日カフカは、謎の生物によって、身体が怪獣化、怪獣討伐を担う日本防衛隊からコードネーム「怪獣8号」と呼ばれる存在になる。
description.ru: Некоторые люди проживают серую жизнь, так и не пережив ничего захватывающего. Но нашему герою вроде бы повезло: хоть он и был недоволен работой, которой ему пришлось заниматься, случается кое-что неожиданное. Он превращается в кайдзю — чудовищное существо, и теперь получает шанс не просто изменить свою жизнь, а достичь всего, о чём он когда-либо мечтал!
description.tr: Yapmak zorunda olduğu işinde pek de memnun olmayan bir adam beklenmedik olaylara karışır..! Bir Kaiju'ya, dehşet verici korkunç, muazzam bir yaratığa dönüşür. Peki ya bu, uzun zamandır hayal ettiği şeylere sonunda kavuşabileceği fırsatıysa..?.
description.pt-br: Um homem, descontente com o trabalho que teve na vida, está envolvido em um evento inesperado...! Ele se torna um Kaijuu, uma criatura monstruosa, dando-lhe uma nova chance de alcançar o que ele sempre sonhou!

altTitles.en: August 31st Long Summer
The Long Summer on August 31

description.en:
Suzuki-kun and Takagi-san — two high-schoolers who found each other in a time loop on August 31. The two are the only ones who keep their memories when it loops. As for the cause of the time loop, one thing comes to mind — Suzuki-kun's lingering regrets for the summer, a guy's greatest ambition....

It's a time loop comedy of youth, romance, and facing love head-on!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10613/episode/353159)
description.ja:
何度も繰り返す8月31日の中で出会った高校生の二人・鈴木くんと高木さん。

記憶を繰り越せるのは二人だけ。

タイムループの原因として考えられるのは、鈴木くんが夏休みにやり残した、男子最大の目標…。

恋と真っ向から対峙する、青春タイムループコメディ！
description.ru:
31 августа повторяется снова и снова. Сохранить об этом воспоминания могут только два школьника – Сузуки-кун и Такаги-сан. Задумавшись о причине возникновения такой временной петли, Сузуки-кун пришёл к выводу, что всё дело в нём: его незавершённых делах летом и большом сожалении на этот счёт. Чтобы выбраться из временной тюрьмы подросток решает действовать…
Вас ждёт любовная комедия противостояния любви и временной петли!
description.vi: Thế giới bị rơi vào 1 vòng lặp thời gian, chỉ có 2 người giữ lại được ký ức là Suzuki và Takagi. Nếu muốn thoát khỏi vòng lặp thì Suzuki phải hoàn thành ước nguyện còn dang dở của cậu: kiếm được bạn gái và thoát kiếp trai tân.

description.en: Ye Qiu was betrayed by his girlfriend, oppressed by his colleagues and misunderstood by his superior, but due to fate, he received a miraculous encounter, which enabled him to save lives, join a mysterious organization, uphold justice, and ultimately becomes a legendary doctor in the city, fulfilling an urban hot-blooded adventure story.
description.pt-br: Ye Qiu foi traído por sua namorada, oprimido por seus colegas e incompreendido por seu superior, mas, devido ao destino, ele teve um encontro milagroso que lhe permitiu salvar vidas, juntar-se a uma organização misteriosa, defender a justiça e, por fim, tornar-se um médico lendário na cidade, realizando uma história de aventura urbana de sangue quente.

description.en:
When Dean, the captain of the swimming club, takes the podium during Pharm’s university orientation, something unusual happens. Though the two have never met before, they’re unable to hide the turmoil that suddenly wells up inside them as they can’t help but feel that this isn’t the first time they’ve laid eyes on each other. Perhaps the red thread of fate links them together from their past lives...

**Note**:
This is the manga adaptation of the Thai novel "*The Red Thread*" and it's drama adaptation "*Until We Meet Again*".
description.fr:
En entrant à l'université, Pharm verse des larmes de nostalgie en voyant Dean, le capitaine du club de natation.
D'autre part, Dean, qui est quelqu'un de calme et tranquille, ne peut cacher son trouble devant l'apparition de Pharm. Les deux s'attirent inévitablement et apprennent qu'ils font le même "rêve" depuis leur plus jeune âge. Un rêve qui connaîtra une fin tragique... Dean réalise qu'il s'agit d'eux dans leur vie antérieure. L'amour les lie par le fil rouge du destin, les deux garçons sont à la merci des souvenirs de leur vie passée...

description.en:
Kang Hyunmoo is a dirt-poor man whose dreams of becoming a hunter were torn apart.

But one day, while he was dreaming of getting rich quick, something appeared in front of him… [Difficulty: Hell. You are entering the Star of Apocalypse.] “…What?” He’ll now be monopolizing items and skills in a future Earth overrun with monsters!
description.ko:
헌터를 꿈꿔볼 가능성도 짓밟힌 흙수저 채취꾼 강현무.
어느 날 일확천금을 꿈꾸며 잠든 그의 앞에 나타난 것은……?!
【난이도: 지옥 종말의 별에 진입합니다.】
“……뭐?”
괴물들로 넘쳐나는 미래의 지구에서 아이템도,
스킬도 나 혼자 독식한다!

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

title.en: Tough Gaiden - The Man Who Succeeds the Dragon

altTitles.en: The Man Who Succeeds The Dragon

altTitles.ja-ro: Tough Gaiden - Ryuu o Tsugu Otoko
Tough Gaiden - Ryuu wo Tsugu Otoko

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en: Yuki Iwatsuki is a transfer student, today is her first day at her new school. There seems to be some kind of trauma, her classmates “Koneko,” a high-tension girl, and “Akizora Hako,” a box-head girl, are very interested in Yuki! Will she get along with everyone?

Bloody Buddy

description.en: In a modern Japan where vampires and werewolves are commonplace in society, Kioi Uzuki runs a sharehouse with his grandmother. He's super excited when they get their first vampire tenant, but their first meeting is a bit of a bumpy one. How will this shy and closed off vampire react to a bubbly enthusiastic all-things-occult-loving human who really wants to be his friend?

altTitles.ja: オオカミくんは好きが隠せない

altTitles.en: The Wolf can't Hide His Affection

description.en:
This is a world where humans and beast people coexist. The helpful leopard, Tomoru, and the wolf, Hibiki, who goes at his own pace, are childhood friends who live together. One day, Tomoru is told by Hibiki that he likes him, and their relationship changes!!! Tomorou, who realizes he thinks of Hibiki as more than family, accepts his confession, and the two of them start dating.
However, Hibiki changes into his beast form whenever he gets excited. How will he skillfully make out now they're lovers...?!

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.ja: 撲殺ピンク～性犯罪者処刑人～

altTitles.en: Beat To Pink

description.en: Gory Revenge Thriller about a fierce young baseball player & a high school girl teaming-up as vigilantes to punish sex offenders and brutally mutilate their dicks.

altTitles.en: There Is No Place for Fakes
No Place for the Fake Princess

altTitles.ja: ニセモノ皇女の居場所はない

description.en:
Philomel—the fake princess—conspires with her mother to impersonate the imperial princess and cause a war between the Mage Tower and the Empire.
Once her crimes were exposed, she was sentenced to execution.
A death truly befitting of a wicked—

“Even if the Philomel within the book had done some wrong, it wasn’t enough to warrant death!”

Philomel yelled and threw the book she'd been reading.
She had simply been curious about a book she'd picked up in the garden, but the contents of the book stated that she would die!
Although she wanted to believe it was nothing but fiction, everything that happened from that moment onwards went just like in the book.

“Since it has come to this… my goal is to survive!”

Will Philomel be able to discover the origins of the suspicious book and live on?

---
After finding a mysterious book in the imperial garden, Princess Philomel not only discovers that the book's villain shares her name, but that other events in the story are coming true too. Now, she believes that she's an imposter and that the real princess will take her rightful place, leading to the execution of Philomel the Fake! So to avoid a tragic death, she has to make sure the rest of the book doesn't come true. Can this fake princess change what's already been written?
description.fr:
Philomel — la fausse princesse — complote avec sa mère pour se faire passer pour la princesse impériale et provoquer une guerre entre la Tour des Mages et l'Empire. Une fois ses crimes exposés, elle est condamnée à l'exécution. Une mort vraiment digne d'une méchante...

‘Même si la Philomel du livre a fait quelque chose de mal, ce n'est pas assez pour justifier la mort!»

Philomel a crié et a jeté le livre qu'elle lisait. Elle avait simplement été curieuse à propos d'un livre qu'elle avait ramassé dans le jardin, mais le contenu du livre disait qu'elle allait mourir! Bien qu'elle ait voulu croire que ce n'était que de la fiction, tout ce qui s'est passé à partir de ce moment-là s'est déroulé comme dans le livre.

«Puisqu'on en est arrivé là... mon but est de survivre!»

Philomel parviendra-t-elle à découvrir les origines du livre suspect et à survivre?
description.id: Setelah bersekongkol dengan ibunya dan memicu perang antara kekaisaran dan menara sihir, Philomel si 'putri palsu' dihukum mati atas semua kejahatannya... Begitulah isi dari buku mencurigakan yang dipungut oleh Philomel di taman. Ia ingin memercayai bahwa cerita di dalam buku itu hanyalah fiksi, tapi semakin hari kejadian di dunia nyata semakin menyerupai buku itu. Agar tidak bernasib sama dengan Philomel yang ada di dalam buku, Philomel memutuskan untuk berusaha bertahan hidup. Akankah hidupnya berjalan sama seperti dengan buku mencurigakan itu?
description.pl:
Philomel - fałszywa księżniczka - spiskowała ze swoją matką, by podszyć się pod cesarską księżniczkę i wywołać wojnę między Wieżą Magów, a Imperium.
Gdy jej zbrodnie zostały ujawnione, została skazana na śmierć.
Konic godny nikczemnika...
"Nawet jeśli Philomel z książki zrobiła coś złego, to nie było to wystarczające, aby uzasadnić wyrok śmierci!"
Philomel krzyknęła i rzuciła książkę, którą czytała.
Była po prostu ciekawa książki, którą znalazła w ogrodzie, ale jej treść mówiła, że umrze!
Choć chciała wierzyć, że to nic innego jak bajka, wszystko, co wydarzyło się od tego momentu, przebiegało dokładnie tak, jak w książce.
"Skoro do tego doszło... moim celem jest przetrwanie!".
Czy Philomel uda się odkryć pochodzenie podejrzanej książki i żyć dalej?
description.pt-br: Philomel, a 'princesa falsa' que conspirou com sua mãe para se passar por princesa imperial, causou uma guerra ao separar a Torre Mágica do Império. Quando ela é considerada culpada de todos os seus crimes, ela é condenada à morte. Realmente digna de uma vilã... "Eu, não, Philomel no livro fiz algo errado, então não é o suficiente para me matar!" Philomel gritou e jogou o livro que estava lendo. Ela estava apenas curiosoa sobre o livro suspeito que pegou no jardim, mas ela, não, a princesa Philomel do livro morreu! Quero acreditar que é apenas uma ficção, mas de alguma forma tudo o que acontece depois se assemelha ao que está escrito no livro. "Agora que está assim... meu único objetivo é sobreviver!" Philomel será capaz de revelar o que aquele livro suspeito diz e reivindicar sua vida?

altTitles.en: Honey Blood

description.en: When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

altTitles.en: One Piece - Digital Colored Comics
One Piece

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

title.en: Shut Up, Evil Dragon! I Don't Want to Raise a Child With You Anymore

altTitles.zh: 闭嘴恶龙我不想再跟你带孩子了

altTitles.en: Shut Up, Malevolent Dragon! I Don’t Want to Have Any More Children With You

description.en:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
description.id: Setelah dikalahkan dan ditangkap, Dragon Slayer Leon menjadi tawanan Silver Dragon Queen. Dengan kesadaran akan kematian, dia menggunakan sihir terlarang untuk mengutuk sang ratu, tetapi secara tak terduga, sang ratu kehilangan kendali. Dia berpikir bahwa ini akan membuat sang ratu hidup dalam rasa malu seumur hidupnya, dan itu akan sepadan dengan misinya sebagai pemburu naga. Namun, dua tahun kemudian, ketika Leon membuka matanya, di sampingnya ada seorang gadis kecil naga dengan ekor...

description.ja: Mami Tomoe's Everyday Life is a slice-of-life featuring a lonely, single, 30-year old Mami Tomoe. It is a remake of the author's original doujinshi series, Mami Tomoe 1X Years Later Mami-san Around 30 Years Old Collection.

altTitles.en: Demon Bug

description.en:
In the middle Heian period, a small island called Onishima is isolated from civilization.
As a young girl, Torago was playing with her sister, Tana, when she disappears into the sea unexpectedly.
However, it wasn't Torago's fault, but the fault of another boy who was playing with them.
Torago and that boy grew up with guilt, and later ended up together, but one day a woman who looks like “Tana” appears in Onishima...
description.es:
A mediados del periodo Heian, la pequeña isla de Onishima está aislada de la civilización.
De niña, Torago estaba jugando junto al mar con su hermana, Tana, cuando esta desapareció por causas ajenas a su voluntad.
Sin embargo, no fue culpa de Torago, sino de otro niño que jugaba con ellas.
Torago y el chico crecen juntos, ambos llenos de culpa, y más tarde terminan juntos, pero un día una mujer que se parece a «Tana» aparece en Onishima...
description.ja:
平安時代中頃、文明から隔離された小さな島「鬼島」。
トラゴは幼少時代、実姉「タナ姉え」と海辺で遊んでいるとき、自分のせいで「タナ姉え」を行方不明にしてしまう。
だが、それはトラゴの過失ではなく、一緒に遊んでいたもう一人の少年の過失だった。
トラゴと少年は共に罪悪感にさいなまれながら成長し、後に結婚するが、ある日「タナ姉え」に似た女が鬼島に漂流してきた…。
description.es-la:
A mediados del periodo Heian, la pequeña isla de Onishima está aislada de la civilización.

Sin embargo, no fue culpa de Torago, sino de otro niño que jugaba con ellas.
Torago y el chico crecen juntos, ambos llenos de culpa, y más tarde terminan juntos, pero un día una mujer que se parece a «Tana» aparece en Onishima...

There, he awakens an inexhaustible life force within-an “Immortal Infinite Holy Body.” With help from an array of loyal companions-a coquettish phoenix, an innocent ferret, a fierce panda… Lin Xing sets out to uncover the secrets of this mysterious land.

altTitles.ar: الوحش المروض من قبل المرأة الشريرة

description.ar:
ا عندما يخرج الشرير الحقيقي الوحيد في الرواية أخذ رجلًا جميلًا وتم ترويضه لبقية حياته. بعد أن دفع مخاوفه إلى أقصى حد ، تعلم كيف يتوسل منها ، ليصبح وحشًا لا يمكنه الهروب أبدًا ، حتى لو تم فك رباطه. ومع ذلك ، يقع الوحش في حب المرأة التي تنقذه ، ويصبح الإمبراطور بجانبه ، ويعاقب الشرير بالقيود الأبدية. بعد القصة ، استولت على جسد الشرير في ذلك الوقت عندما كانت في منتصف الطريق لترويض الرجل الرئيسي. ……ماذا علي أن أفعل؟ أولا ، دعونا نتراجع عن غسيل المخ شيئا فشيئا. وبعد ذلك ... دعونا نتظاهر بأننا قد تبنا. "لقد مررت بالكثير من المتاعب في البحث عنك." "أنا ... لا أفهم تمامًا ما تقصده يا جلالة الملك." "كيف أنسى لمستك؟" أمسك بمعصمي ، وأمسك بيدي وحركها برفق على خده - تمامًا مثلما فعلت إليانا ، الشريرة في الرواية ، دائمًا عندما تمدحه. "سأروّضك ، مثلما فعلت - وحشًا لا يمكنه فعل أي شيء بدوني." غطت كفي على خده ثم شفتيه. وضع عليها قبلة قصيرة قبل أن يسحب يدي ببطء

---

description.en:
The only real villain in the novel, took a handsome man and tamed him for the rest of his life. After putting his fear to the limit, he learned to plead with her, becoming a beast from which he could never escape even if he loosened his leash. However, one day, the beast falls in love and becomes emperor with the woman who saved him, and plunges the evil woman into an eternal bondage.

---
I've posessed the body of the sociopathic villainess, Illyana! An evil villainess who picks up a boy named Magnus and raises him however she pleases... that Illyana is me?!

"I am going to tame you into a beast that cannot do anything without me. Just as you had done to me."

And after 2 years, he who had become an emperor began his revenge. Excuse me, author! Illyana was the sinner but why must I suffer his vengeance? I was just a normal reader named Yuna!

---

تنها شرور واقعی رمان، مرد خوش تیپی را گرفت و تا آخر عمر اهلی خودش کرد. بعد از اینکه ترسش را نسبت به خودش زیاد کرد، مرد یاد گرفت که از او التماس کند و تبدیل به حیوانی شد که حتی اگر افسارش را شل کند هرگز نمی توانست از او فرار کند. با این حال، یک روز، حیوان عاشق می شود و با زنی که او را نجات داد، امپراتور می شود و زن شرور را در اسارتی ابدی فرو می برد.

description.fr:
Iliana, la maléfique méchante d'un roman recueille un beau garçon qu'elle dompte comme une bête. À l'aide de drogues et de lavage de cerveau, L'homme laisse peu à peu place à la bête jusqu'à ce que l'héroïne le sauve. La bête deviendra l'empereur du pays et punira la méchante pour l'éternité. C'est une histoire qui aurait pu m'amuser si je n'avais pas été transportée dans le corps de la méchante au beau milieu du roman. Que faire de cette bête rampant à mes pieds? Comment échapper à la terrible fin qui m'attend?

---

description.tr:
Cani kadın İllyana oldum! Magnus adındaki bir çocuğu yanına alıp onu istediği gibi yetiştiren kötü kadın İllyana… Ben İllyana oldum öyle mi?!
“Seni, ‘bensiz bir hiç olan canavar’ olarak evcilleştireceğim. Tıpkı senin bana yaptığın gibi.”
Ve 2 yıl sonra imparator olup intikamını almaya başladı. Pardon, yazar! İllyana günahkardı ama neden onun intikamını almak zorundayım? Ben sadece Yuna adında normal bir okuyucuydum!

description.uk:
Єдина справжня лиходійка у романі взяла красеня і приборкала його назавжди. 
Дійшовши межі та ставши звіром, він навчився благати її. Від сутності його неможливо втекти навіть якщо розірвати повідець. Та це триває тільки доти, поки він не стає імператором, закохується в рятівницю та занурює лиходійку у вічне рабство. 
Я потрапила у ту частину, де головний герой ще не приборканий повністю. 
Що робити? Спочатку приборкати його повністю, а потім покаятись? 
«Це важко забути».
«Що ви маєте на увазі… Я не знаю, Ваша Величносте Імператор».
«Як я можу забути цей твій дотик?»
Він схопив мене за руку, підніс її до щоки й обережно потерся.
Так само, як завжди робила лиходійка у романі, коли хвалила його.
«Я приборкаю тебе. Як ти зробила зі мною, звіром, який без тебе нічого не може зробити».
Долоня, що так ненавмисно торкнулася його щоки, досягла губ. Він коротко поцілував долоню, потім повільно прибрав руку...

---
